mosinstall.name: Paste
mosinstall.author: Ryan Demmer
mosinstall.description:
Paste plugin for JCE

Changelog (from 1.0.0):

  • Fixed errors in parameter labels

param.name: paste_create_paragraphs
param.label: Create Paragraphs
param.description: If enabled double linefeeds are converted to paragraph elements when using the plain text dialog. This is enabled by default.

param.name: paste_create_linebreaks
param.label: Create Line Breaks
param.description: If enabled single linefeeds are converted to hard line break elements when using the plain text dialog. This is enabled by default.

param.name: paste_use_dialog
param.label: Use Dialog
param.description: MSIE specific option, if you set this to true both Mozilla and MSIE will present a paste dialog. If you set it to false pasting in MSIE will be done directly. This option is set to false by default.

param.name: paste_auto_cleanup_on_paste
param.label: Auto Cleanup on Paste
param.description: MSIE specific option. If you enable this feature, a word paste will be executed when the user copy/paste content to the editor. This feature is disabled by default.

param.name: paste_strip_class_attributes
param.label: Strip Class Attributes
param.description: This feature allows you to control whether or not class attributes are stripped when using pasteword.
param.option: all - will strip all class attributes from the pasted content.
none - will not strip any class attributes from the pasted content.
mso - will strip out all of the class attribute values that start with "Mso", but retain all others.

param.name: paste_remove_spans
param.label: Remove Spans
param.description: This enables you to control if the word parse operation should remove or keep span elements, they will be removed by default.

param.name: paste_remove_styles
param.label: Remove Styles
param.description: This enables you to control if the word parse operation should remove or keep style attributes, they will be removed by default.
